caption.p: Body weights of offspring. Estimated marginal means ( ±) SEM of body weight at post-natal day 7 (A), post-natal day 21 (B), and at 7 months of age (C). * p < 0.05 relative to vehicle ** p < 0.0125 relative to vehicle ( n = 9, 11, 9, 10, 10 respectively for vehicle, 1.5, 15, 150, and 1,500 μg/kg/day treatment groups). Models included covariates: litter, date body weight was taken and litter size.
